title: Add unit tests for formatTimeAgo, sortIssues, config validation
description:
Critical test coverage gaps identified in PR review. The new logic has zero unit tests.

Tests needed:
1. formatTimeAgo() - "just now", "5m ago", "1h ago", "yesterday", "3d ago", invalid dates
2. sortIssues() - open before closed, closed by recency, NaN handling
3. Config validation - invalid type, NaN, below min, above max, boundary values

Recommendation: Add vitest as unit test framework - these are pure functions that can be tested without VSCode dependencies.

title: No runtime validation of recentWindowHours config
Silent empty array on CLI failure
description:
IMPORTANT: CLI failures in listReadyIssues and exportIssuesWithDeps return empty arrays without user-visible feedback. Users see an empty tree view with no indication that the `bd` command failed.

Location: beadsService.ts:76-79, 132-135

Hidden errors include: bd command not found, permission denied, database corruption, invalid workspace path.

Recommendation: Distinguish between "no issues exist" and "failed to get issues" - consider showing VS Code notification when CLI fails.

title: Fix tree view to show blocks dependencies as hierarchy

The extension shows issues as a flat list instead of a tree because it only recognizes `parent-child` type dependencies. Need to also recognize `blocks` type dependencies for tree hierarchy.

Root cause: deps=["parent-id"] creates blocks dependencies, not parent-child.
Fix: Modify beadsService.ts to check for both dependency types.

title: Open children of closed parents not visible in filtered views
description: CRITICAL: When a parent issue is closed but has open child issues (via blocks dependency), the children are not visible in Open/Recent filters. The children have parentId set to the closed parent, so they only appear nested under it - but since the parent is filtered out, the children disappear. Open issues should always be visible regardless of parent status.
